newsitem.title: JAPAN: INSIGHT - JGBs seen edging upwards, target 123.50.
newsitem.headline: INSIGHT - JGBs seen edging upwards, target 123.50.

text.p: FUTURE RANGE/DAY SPPRT RSTNC RSI-9 MA-5 MA-25
OUTLOOK OF BOJ OPERATION AT 0020 GMT: INJECTION OF 200 BLN YEN
*The key September 10-year JGB futures are expected to have upward bias on Wednesday as sentiment has brightened after release of weak April machinery orders data on Tuesday.
*However, launch of 300-400 billion yen worth of corporate straight bonds over this week and next week may weigh on JGBs, trader for city bank's securities unit said.
